Config.Text.Icon: Icons require full asset path to svg icon, set to null to disable. For example, game:textures/icons/checkmark.svg
Config.Text.Markers: "dead" and "pet" are used for not configurable states of entities. You can add your own groups
Config.Text.RefreshRate: How often to check for alive status, visibility, horizontal and vertical radius of markers (default: 1000, disable: -1)
